summary: Implements a readout error mitigation strategy that treats each qubit independently, using a separate 2×2 assignment/mitigation matrix per qubit. It can be calibrated from experimental data or derived from backend properties, and provides corrected expectation values and quasi‑probability distributions with computational cost scaling as O(2^N).
business_intent: Enable fast and accurate correction of measurement errors in quantum hardware when errors are assumed uncorrelated, improving the reliability of downstream analytics such as expectation‑value calculations and probability estimations.
